original_text: For as Jonah was a sign to the Ninevites, so also will the Son of Man be to this generation.
korean_text: 요나가 니느웨 사람들에게 표적이 됨과 같이 인자도 이 세대에 그러하리라

sentences.original_text: For as Jonah was a sign to the Ninevites,
sentences.korean_translation: 요나가 니느웨 사람들에게 표적이 된 것 같이,

sentences.original_text: so also will the Son of Man be
